pre_caption: This is a stunning, static long-exposure or timelapse shot of the Eiffel Tower in Paris at night. The primary motion is captured in the bright red and white light trails of traffic moving along the road on the left. There is also subtle movement from boats on the Seine River, whose lights reflect on the water.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

gpt_feedback:
1. The clouds in the sky are also moving, and there is a rotating light device at the top of the Eiffel Tower emitting blue beams.
2. The description of "subtle movement from boats on the Seine River" is inaccurate, as the boats on the river are moving quickly.

gpt_caption: This captivating long-exposure or timelapse shot of the Eiffel Tower in Paris at night showcases dynamic elements throughout the scene. The bright red and white light trails of traffic moving along the road on the left create a striking visual effect. In the sky, clouds drift by, adding to the sense of motion, while a rotating light device at the top of the Eiffel Tower emits blue beams. On the Seine River, boats move swiftly, their lights reflecting vibrantly on the water.
